title: Specula HUD
description: Specula HUD is a V-Slice HUD mod made by NightCypher303. It features a score bar (displayed above the health bar showing your score, combo, max combo, accuracy, and health), a judgement counter (showing Sicks, Goods, Bads, Shits, and Misses), and a watermark. Enjoy the mod!

contributors.name: NightCypher303
contributors.role: Creator of Specula HUD, and a slacker
